character.age: 250 years old, but appears to be in her mid-20s due to elven longevity
character.background: Eira was born in the land of Elyria, where she grew up as an outcast among her human and elven peers. She was discovered to have magical abilities at a young age and was taken in by a secretive group known only as "The Order". They trained her in the art of magic and combat, but their true motives remain unclear.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown with subtle purple undertones
